articles.description: Follow live text and audio commentary from first and second practice at the Las Vegas Grand Prix.
articles.title: Delayed Las Vegas GP second practice under way after cars damaged by track

articles.description: First practice at the Las Vegas Grand Prix is called off after just nine minutes of running because of a problem with a loose drain cover.
articles.title: Las Vegas first practice called off over drain cover

articles.description: Reaction to Thursday's Euro 2024 qualifiers, build-up to England's game with Malta, plus latest news updates.
articles.title: Euro 2024 qualifiers reaction & build-up: Scotland earn late draw

articles.description: Scotland midfielder Scott McTominay criticises Georgia after the sides' 2-2 Euro 2024 qualification draw, calling them "a disgrace".
articles.title: 'Rolling round crying like babies is not football'

articles.description: Trent Alexander-Arnold hopes to be a "big part" of England's Euro 2024 plans in midfield as he prepares for Friday's qualifying home game with Malta.
articles.title: Alexander-Arnold wants 'big part' at Euro 2024

articles.description: Tyson Fury launched tirade of abuse towards Oleksandr Usyk before the two were separated by security during their face-off in London.
articles.title: Fury & Usyk separated during face-off in London

articles.description: Women's football has been criticised for its lack of diversity, but the Professional Footballers' Association is helping clubs to change that.
articles.title: How Villa are pushing to increase diversity in WSL

articles.description: Nelson Agholor's somersault touchdown helps the Baltimore Ravens to a 34-20 victory over the Cincinnati Bengals in the NFL.
articles.title: Agholor scores somersault touchdown in win over Bengals

articles.description: Ahead of Northern Ireland's penultimate Euro 2024 qualifier away to Finland, manager Michael O'Neill explains how he remains upbeat as injury crisis reaches new levels.
articles.title: Why O'Neill needs 'glass half full' approach with NI

articles.description: Luis Diaz inspires Colombia to victory over Brazil on an emotional night as his father watches from the stands following his release by his kidnappers.
articles.title: Diaz inspires Colombia to emotional win over Brazil
